com.interpss.core.aclf.adj

Interface BaseBusBranchControl

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.hazelcast.nio.serialization.DataSerializable, org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject, IAclfAdjustment, NameTag, org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Notifier
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AclfBusControl, BranchFlowControl, PQBusLimit, PSXfrPControl, PVBusLimit, RemoteQBus, RemoteQControlGroup, StaticVarCompensator, SwitchedShunt, TapControl
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AclfBusControlImpl, BaseBusBranchControlImpl, BranchFlowControlImpl, PQBusLimitImpl, PSXfrPControlImpl, PVBusLimitImpl, RemoteQBusImpl, RemoteQControlGroupImpl, StaticVarCompensatorImpl, SwitchedShuntImpl, TapControlImpl

    public interface BaseBusBranchControl
extends NameTag, IAclfAdjustment
    A representation of the model object 'Base Bus Branch Control'. Aclf bus/branch adjustment/control base class. It has two statuses: 1) AdjustStatus: for tracking controller limit violation status. 2) ControlStatus: for turn-on/off the controller completely. the NameTag.status is used for tracking this status.

    The following features are supported:

    • Adjust Status
    • Adj Control Type
    • Control Mode
    • Desired Control Range
    See Also:
    AclfAdjustPackage.getBaseBusBranchControl()

      • getAdjControlType

        AclfAdjustControlType getAdjControlType()
        Returns the value of the 'Adj Control Type' attribute. The default value is "PointControl". The literals are from the enumeration AclfAdjustControlType. Aclf branch adjustment/control flow control type, RangeControl or PointControl

        the value of the 'Adj Control Type' attribute.

        LimitType getDesiredControlRange()

      • isAdjustStatus

        boolean isAdjustStatus()
        Returns the value of the 'Adjust Status' attribute. The default value is "true". Controller ajustment status, it might be turn-off due to the limit violation.
